tweet:
48 PRs merged.

Polly now speaks OpenAI-compatible API ‚Äî swap the URL, keep your client.

App Showcase got a pixel-perfect renovation with proper metrics and badges. And we shipped "BrainrotMaker", because the internet clearly wasn't weird enough yet. üêù
alt_tweet:
Week in review: 48 PRs.

- Polly API is now OpenAI-compatible
- App Showcase got a total UI overhaul
- NPM packages moved to @pollinations_ai
- Added "BrainrotMaker" to the creative suite

Productivity was high. Chaos was moderate. üçÑ
image_prompt: Cozy pixel art RPG quest log screen. Title text "WEEKLY LOG" in chunky pixel font at the top. Three retro UI panels listing completed quests: "OpenAI API", "New Showcase", "BrainrotMaker". Polly the Bee (yellow/brown stripes, pink blush, blue wings) is stamping the board with a green checkmark. The small monitor-head robot is holding a scroll that says "48 PRs". Lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic, Stardew Valley vibes. High contrast text.
reasoning: Highlights the most technical achievement (OpenAI compat) and the most visual one (Showcase), while using the 'BrainrotMaker' app for dry humor. The '48 PRs' metric establishes momentum.
